name: Mulled cider
description: It's easy to make your own mulled cider. As well as fruit and spices, we've added extra apple brandy to our version of this delicious winter warmer
keywords: Apple brandy, Bonfire Night, Christmas party, Cocktail, Comfort Food, Good Food, halloween drinks, mulling, New Year's eve, Winter

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the cider, Calvados, apple juice and sugar into a large saucepan, and gently heat to mull.
Add the orange zest and spices, bring to a simmer, then turn down and keep on a low heat for 20-30 mins. Ladle into glass mugs to serve.

name: Honey soy sprouts
description: Try a new twist on sprouts. Shredding and coating them in a sticky soy and honey sauce takes them to a new level – it's sure to be a crowd-pleaser
keywords: Brussel sprouts, christmas sprouts, soy sprouts, Sprouts
recipeIngredients: thumb-sized piece ginger peeled and cut into small pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Stir the honey and the soy together in a small bowl. Set aside.

Heat the oil in a wok and fry the ginger and garlic for 1 min. Add the shredded sprouts and stir-fry for 1-2 mins until wilted. Pour in the Shaoxing wine, then the honey sauce. Toss everything together. Season, drizzle with the sesame oil, scatter with sesame seeds and serve.
